plot outline: A group of four friends goes to Bombay in search of a job opportunity after completing their studies. They go their own ways and come face to the face with the harsh realities of working in the city. Everything goes fine for the friends until the sudden demise of one of the friends, which changes their life forever.
title: Dil Dosti Love in Life
plot: A group of four friends goes to Bombay in search of a job opportunity after completing their studies. They go their own ways and come face to the face with the harsh realities of working in the city. Everything goes fine for the friends until the sudden demise of one of the friends, which changes their life forever.
